sense.gloss: leaving school (at the end of the day), getting out of school, coming home from school

sdata.j: どの↑生徒↑↓せいと↓も６↑時↑↓じ↓までに|↑下校|↑↓げこう↓しなければならない。
sdata.e: Every student has to leave school by six.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓たちはたった↑今|↑↓いま↓↑下校|↑↓げこう↓した。
|↑下校|↑↓げこう↓の↑途中↑↓とちゅう↓で↑犬↑↓いぬ↓をつれた↑女↑↓おんな↓の↑子↑↓こ↓と↑遊↑↓あそ↓んだ。
sdata.e: Halfway back from school I played with a girl who was walking her dog.

sdata.j: ↑防犯↑↓ぼうはん↓のために↑登|↑↓とう↓↑下校|↑↓げこう↓↑時↑↓じ↓は、↑名札↑↓なふだ↓を↑外↑↓はず↓してください。
sdata.e: In order to prevent crime, please take off your name tag when travelling to and from school.
